#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main(){

  int t,n;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--){
    cin>>n;
    float var=1,val;
    while(1){
      val = var;
      int i;
      for(i=n;i>0;i--){
	val = ((n*val)/(n-1))+1;
	if(long(val)==val && val>=6){
	  //Cout<<val<<endl;
	  continue;
	}
	else{
	  var+=n;
	  break;
	}
      }
      if(i==0){
	cout<<val<<endl;
	break;
      }
    }
  }
  return 0;
}
